titles.title: To define marriage for all legal purposes in the District of Columbia to consist of the union of one man and one woman.
To define marriage for all legal purposes in the District of Columbia to consist of the union of one man and one woman.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia.

bill.summary: Defines "marriage" for all legal purposes in the District of Columbia to mean the union of one man and one woman.
